Excellent pica-pica!  I love their assortment of Tapas.  Very conveniently located along Paseo del Born.  Very lively atmosphere  in the middle of the square.  Outside seating is a must.  Perfect for your weekend light hors d'oeuvre, small morsels of food to cover a wide range of dining.  We ordered tortilla de patatas, you just have to because its good.  Pescadito Frito, simply my favorite, botifarra trufada & jamon Iberico are the traditonal must have.The wait staff are friendly and helpful especially when you are confused on what to order from a long list of tapas choices.  Always pair your tapas with "cava" (Catalan sparkling wine) its my new favorite refreshing cold drink, goes well with your food, especially seafood.
